sentences.en: a book that will challenge your preconceptions about rural life
sentences.cn: 一本改变你对农村生活成见的书

sentences.en: a boy with a reputation for challenging the authority of his teachers
sentences.cn: 例句： 一个以挑战老师权威而出名的男孩

sentences.en: After lunch, Carey challenged me to a game of tennis.
sentences.cn: 午饭后，凯里邀请我和他比一场网球。

sentences.en: He said he's game for a similar challenge next year.
sentences.cn: 他说他明年还愿意接受类似的挑战。

sentences.en: Her challenge reduced them to silence.
sentences.cn: 她的质问让他们哑口无言。

sentences.en: I called out a challenge, but there was no reply.
sentences.cn: 我提出挑战，但是没人回应。

sentences.en: I would challenge the, er, suggestion that we're in third place.
sentences.cn: 我不太同意，呃，我们位居第三的说法。

sentences.en: Increasingly, more wine-makers are taking up the challenge of growing Pinot Noir.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的酿酒商开始接受种植黑皮诺葡萄的挑战。

sentences.en: It was a challenge, keeping ten boisterous seven-year-olds amused.
sentences.cn: 要逗着十个好动的七岁孩子玩真是一种挑战。

sentences.en: It was ill-prepared to meet this challenge.
sentences.cn: 应对这一挑战明显准备不足。

sentences.en: No one could challenge her supremacy in gymnastics.
sentences.cn: 她是最优秀的体操运动员,无人能胜过她.

sentences.en: Online gaming allows players from around the world to challenge each other.
sentences.cn: 网络游戏使得全球的玩家可以相互较量。

sentences.en: The challenge offended their sensibilities.
sentences.cn: 这一质疑伤害了他们的感情。

sentences.en: The company is ready to meet the challenges of the next few years.
sentences.cn: 公司已准备好迎接今后几年的挑战。

sentences.en: The job doesn't really challenge him.
sentences.cn: 这项工作不能真正地考验他.

sentences.en: The role will be the biggest challenge of his acting career.
sentences.cn: 扮演这个角色将是他演艺生涯中最大的挑战。

sentences.en: The teams responded magnificently to the challenge.
sentences.cn: 各队都非常出色地接受了挑战.

sentences.en: The tobacco industry escaped unscathed from its toughest legal challenge.
sentences.cn: 烟草业成功逃过了最严峻的法律质疑。

sentences.en: They intended to challenge the legality of his claim in the courts.
sentences.cn: 他们打算在法庭上对他的要求的合法性提出质疑。

sentences.en: They threw down the challenge that he couldn’t wash 40 cars in one hour (= invited him to try to do it ) .
sentences.cn: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

sentences.en: They went to the High Court to challenge the decision .
sentences.cn: 他们就这项判决向高等法院提出上诉。

words.tran_cn: 挑战的；引起挑战性兴趣的
要求；质疑；反对；向…挑战；盘问（challenge的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 接受挑战，奋起应付挑战

trans.tran_en: to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal
something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting
something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting
something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting
to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal

trans.tran_cn: 反对， 公然反抗； 向…挑战； 对…质疑， 对…怀疑
trans.tran_en: to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal
